name: CANVAS.CODED.03
description:
ABOUT THIS PIECE
This piece was created in 75000 iterations of a process that use a smart growing algorithm. The algorithm tries to mimic the oil canvas. Each stroke is composed of thousands of colored lines with random increases of color.

ABOUT THE COLLECTION
The series "CANVAS CODED" is composed by 5 artworks that where created using Processing.org and Java, a carefully selection of colors and too much hours of coding.

Created with Processing, November 2021.
